org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema

Class SqlSourcedColumn<K extends Cell>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema.NiReportedEntity<K>
      • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema.NiReportColumn<K>
        • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema.SqlSourcedColumn<K>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PsqlSourcedColumn

    public abstract class SqlSourcedColumn<K extends Cell>
extends NiReportColumn<K>
    a column which fetches its input from an sql view/table. Offers utility methods for reading coordinates and metadata
